introduction.section1: The city of Himeji is above all known for its magnificent castle, considered one of the most beautiful castles in Japan.
introduction.section2: But Himeji is not just a castle. Take a day and discover the Koko-en Garden, a huge park with multiple gardens and go on an excursion to Mount Shosha to discover the Engy≈ç-ji temple.

title: Himeji
meta-description: In each article, we answer your questions: When to go? How long ? What budget to plan? For each place visited, we try to convey our visit and our impression as well as possible. We also tell you How to get there? Why ? When? How long and at what period? Without forgetting the locations and the prices.
